DOC.brief_summary: Randomized study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of nafamostat mesilate use during continuous renal replacement therapy in acute kidney injury patients at a high risk of bleeding.
DOC.brief_title: Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Nafamostat Mesilate During Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Patients were randomly assigned to the nafamostat mesilate (NM) group or the no anticoagulant (NA) group. In patients assigned to the NM group, NM (20mg/h) was used for maintenance anticoagulation. Whereas, in patients assigned to the NA group, normal saline (2mL/h) was infused for continuous renal replacement therapy.
